comment.author: 29066848@N04
comment._content: I went to Glanllyn with the Urdd a few times but never to Llangranog. I know Glanllyn is still up and running as I drive past Llyn Tegid fairly regularly, what about Llangranog? -- Seen on my Flickr home page. ( ?² )

comment.realname: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru  / The National Library of Wales
comment.author: 37199428@N06
comment._content:
Thank you for your comment.
Yes, Glanllyn and Llangrannog are still going! Perhaps you'd like to visit Llangrannog?http://www.urdd.org/llangrannog/index.php?lng=en
